name: LPCode Flutuante BTN
author: lpcode

sections.description:
This plugin adds a floating button to the website with the aim of prompting the user to start a WhatsApp conversation with the website owner.

Please report any bugs to plugins in a support thread

This is young software. It works, but there’s a lot left on the todo (check out the Other Notes tab). Have an idea? Let me know.

Ideas

* Possibility of a CTA message.
* Possibility to add more numbers.
* Possibility of adding more buttons with different functionalities.

Want to add something here? I’m all ears. plugins at lpcode.com.br or @lp.code on instagram.

I will prioritize these tasks based on feedback, so let me know what you’d like to see.
